verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I heard, <S%G191><s%> as it were, a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Hallelujah! <S%G239><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> and power <S%G1411><s%> belong to our God; <S%G2316><s%>

because <S%G3754><s%> His judgments <S%G2920><s%> are true <S%G228><s%> and righteous; <S%G1342><s%> for He has judged <S%G2919><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> harlot <S%G4204><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> was corrupting <S%G5351><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> with her immorality, <S%G4202><s%> and He has avenged <S%G1556><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of His bond-servants on her. "
And a second <S%G1208><s%> time <S%G1208><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Hallelujah! <S%G239><s%> Her smoke <S%G2586><s%> rises <S%G305><s%> up forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>"

And the twenty-four <S%G5064><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> and the four living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> down <S%G4098><s%> and worshiped <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> who sits <S%G2521><s%> on the throne <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Amen. <S%G281><s%> Hallelujah! <S%G239><s%>"

And a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> from the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Give <S%G134><s%> praise <S%G134><s%> to our God, <S%G2316><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> you His bond-servants, you who fear <S%G5399><s%> Him, the small <S%G3398><s%> and the great. <S%G3173><s%>"

And I heard, <S%G191><s%> as it were, the voice <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> and as the sound <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%> and as the sound <S%G5456><s%> of mighty <S%G2478><s%> peals <S%G1027><s%> of thunder, <S%G1027><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Hallelujah! <S%G239><s%> For the Lord <S%G2962><s%> our God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> reigns. <S%G936><s%>

"Let us rejoice <S%G5463><s%> and be glad <S%G21><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> to Him, for the marriage <S%G1062><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> has come <S%G2064><s%> and His bride <S%G1135><s%> has made <S%G2090><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> ready. <S%G2090><s%>"

And it was given <S%G1325><s%> to her to clothe <S%G4016><s%> herself in fine <S%G1039><s%> linen, <S%G1039><s%> bright <S%G2986><s%> [and] clean; <S%G2513><s%> for the fine <S%G1039><s%> linen <S%G1039><s%> is the righteous <S%G1345><s%> acts <S%G1345><s%> of the saints. <S%G40><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "Write, <S%G1125><s%> 'Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are those <S%G3588><s%> who are invited <S%G2564><s%> to the marriage <S%G1062><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> of the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>'" And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "These <S%G3778><s%> are true <S%G228><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

And I fell <S%G4098><s%> at his feet <S%G4228><s%> to worship <S%G4352><s%> him. And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "Do not do <S%G3708><s%> that; I am <S%G1510><s%> a fellow <S%G4889><s%> servant <S%G4889><s%> of yours <S%G4771><s%> and your brethren <S%G80><s%> who hold <S%G2192><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> For the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of prophecy. <S%G4394><s%>"

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> opened; <S%G455><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> horse, <S%G2462><s%> and He who sat <S%G2521><s%> upon it [is] called <S%G2564><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> and True; <S%G228><s%> and in righteousness <S%G1343><s%> He judges <S%G2919><s%> and wages <S%G4170><s%> war. <S%G4170><s%>

And His eyes <S%G3788><s%> [are] a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire, <S%G4442><s%> and upon His head <S%G2776><s%> [are] many <S%G4183><s%> diadems; <S%G1238><s%> and He has <S%G2192><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> [upon Him] which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> Himself. <S%G846><s%>
And [He is] clothed <S%G4016><s%> with a robe <S%G2440><s%> dipped <S%G911><s%> in blood; <S%G129><s%> and His name <S%G3686><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> The Word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the armies <S%G4753><s%> which are in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> in fine <S%G1039><s%> linen, <S%G1039><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> [and] clean, <S%G2513><s%> were following <S%G190><s%> Him on white <S%G3022><s%> horses. <S%G2462><s%>

And from His mouth <S%G4750><s%> comes <S%G1607><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sword, <S%G4501><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that with it He may smite <S%G3960><s%> the nations; <S%G1484><s%> and He will rule <S%G4165><s%> them with a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron; <S%G4603><s%> and He treads <S%G3961><s%> the wine <S%G3025><s%> <S%G3631><s%> press <S%G3025><s%> of the fierce <S%G2372><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

And on His robe <S%G2440><s%> and on His thigh <S%G3382><s%> He has <S%G2192><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> "KING <S%G935><s%> OF KINGS, <S%G935><s%> AND LORD <S%G2962><s%> OF LORDS. <S%G2962><s%>"

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in the sun; <S%G2246><s%> and he cried <S%G2896><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the birds <S%G3732><s%> which fly <S%G4072><s%> in midheaven, <S%G3321><s%> "Come, <S%G1205><s%> assemble <S%G4863><s%> for the great <S%G3173><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

in order <S%G2443><s%> that you may eat <S%G2068><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of kings <S%G935><s%> and the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of commanders <S%G5506><s%> and the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of mighty <S%G2478><s%> men <S%G2478><s%> and the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of horses <S%G2462><s%> and of those <S%G3588><s%> who sit <S%G2521><s%> on them and the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G3956><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> men <S%G1658><s%> and slaves, <S%G1401><s%> and small <S%G3398><s%> and great. <S%G3173><s%> "

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and their armies, <S%G4753><s%> assembled <S%G4863><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> Him who sat <S%G2521><s%> upon the horse, <S%G2462><s%> and against <S%G3326><s%> His army. <S%G4753><s%>

And the beast <S%G2342><s%> was seized, <S%G4084><s%> and with him the false <S%G5578><s%> prophet <S%G5578><s%> who performed <S%G4160><s%> the signs <S%G4592><s%> in his presence, <S%G1799><s%> by which <S%G3739><s%> he deceived <S%G4105><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who had received <S%G2983><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who worshiped <S%G4352><s%> his image; <S%G1504><s%> these <S%G3588><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> were thrown <S%G906><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> into the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> which burns <S%G2545><s%> with brimstone. <S%G2303><s%>

And the rest <S%G3062><s%> were killed <S%G615><s%> with the sword <S%G4501><s%> which came <S%G1831><s%> from the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of Him who sat <S%G2521><s%> upon the horse, <S%G2462><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the birds <S%G3732><s%> were filled <S%G5526><s%> with their flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
